img_above_text:
![Wukong Sahali 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b9/Wukong_Sahali_7.jpg)
Other times, his third attack will have him extend his clawed hand back and charge up, before performing a dashing impaling thrust attack that covers a lot of ground quickly, so be ready to react when he lunges at you.
img_below_text:
Another common attack combo he will perform will be to drag his claws slowly through the ground and pull them upward to attack and spread sand — which you can easily spot and deflect to interrupt him. If you don’t, he’ll charge forward through the sand to stab with his extended claws.
![Wukong Sahali 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_Sahali_5.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Sahali 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b9/Wukong_Sahali_7.jpg)
Other times, his third attack will have him extend his clawed hand back and charge up, before performing a dashing impaling thrust attack that covers a lot of ground quickly, so be ready to react when he lunges at you."
        - Following Text: "Another common attack combo he will perform will be to drag his claws slowly through the ground and pull them upward to attack and spread sand — which you can easily spot and deflect to interrupt him. If you don’t, he’ll charge forward through the sand to stab with his extended claws.
![Wukong Sahali 5.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_Sahali_5.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player character engaged in a battle against a large enemy named "Yellow-Robed Squire." The environment features a rocky, desolate landscape with distant temple-like structures. The player is shown using a staff weapon while surrounded by visual effects indicating an attack or defense maneuver. The UI displays consumable items (e.g., "Evil Repelling Medicament") and abilities (e.g., "Rock Solid") available for use during the fight. The preceding and following text describes the enemy's attack patterns, emphasizing its claw-based moves and charging strikes.
